# Roleplay Rule 6 ## Erotic roleplay is prohibited.
[italic]This also includes any other sexual-related speech, and behavior, or unserious roleplay involving bodily functions (e.g., defecation or urination).[/italic]
The intent or reasoning behind engaging in this behavior is completely irrelevant. This rule extends to typed phrases, actions, and misuse of the character emotes system.
